article_title: Bureaucrats Blocking Your Health Care Options

article_metadata.description: This week, the John Locke Foundation sponsored a lecture by one of North Carolina’s top hospital lobbyists, a self-professed fan of the free market, albeit with one big exception. The purpose of his presentation was to rebut a previous speaker, a physician who strongly objects to the state’s Certificate of [...]
article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo
